title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 69 - Mandatory Transfers To Surplus For Thrift Institutions Pursuant To Banking Law, Sections 244(3) And 387(1)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 69 - Mandatory Transfers To Surplus For Thrift Institutions Pursuant To Banking Law, Sections 244(3) And 387(1)

State Regulations
§ 69.1 - Transfers to surplus funds of savings banks
§ 69.2 - Credits to surplus account of savings and loan associations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 69

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 244[3], 387[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
